name: Pepe Coin BSC
description: PePe Coin Bsc ($PPC) token was born exclusively for the BNB smartchain blockchain inspired by Pepe coin. The Inu’s have had their day. It’s time for the most recognizable meme in the world to take his reign as king of the memes. Pepe is here to make memecoins great again. Launched stealth with no presale, no team Tokens, LP burnt and contract renounced, $PPC is a coin for the people, forever. Fueled by pure memetic power, let $PPC show you the way. When was the launch? PEPE Coin BSC ($PPC) Will list Pancakeswap at the end of April. Will you be renouncing ownership? Of course, after launch. Will there be burn? Token burns will take place and will be announced on our media channels. HOW DOES THE TRANSACTION TAX WORK? Total 10% buying and selling fee: 3% Marketing, 4% Reward Holders, 3% Add LP What was the intial liquidity? Initially, 93.1% of tokens will be added liquidity.
